Perfect Harmony Two Great Products Working Together
With the new MA EMD mandate scheduled for July 1, 2012, let PowerPhone Total Response and TriTech Imc Solutions CAD get you where you need to be - all without spending a dime!*
POWERPHONE - Structured, incident-specific questioning - Ability to make multi-service calls easier and more efficient - Response Advisor makes objective recommendations then passes to CAD seamlessly - QA module integrated to enforce operational standards
TRITECH SOFTWARE SYSTEMS: IMC SOLUTIONS - Call reasons automatically initiate Total Response - CAD location and calling party auto backfill into Total Response - Questions and answers from Total Response are automatically saved in CAD EMD Tab - Questions and answers updated to mobile for up-to-date information to first responders
Together, PowerPone and TriTech Imc Solutions make meeting the EMD Mandate easy and affordable.
